name: Concordium
introduce:
Concordium is a proof-of-stake blockchain with identification built into the protocol to meet regulatory requirements, while delivering a user-friendly platform that can handle smart contracts.
Concordium utilizing zero-knowledge-proofs (ZKP) allows parties to verify information without exchanging or storing that information on-chain other than hash functions, so users can trust that their confidential business will become no one else’s business.
Concordium's unique ID disclosure mechanism allows regulators to revoke privacy to identify suspected bad actors and illegal transactions.
